summary: Two small ESP files to make the Staff of Magnus and Auriel's Bow have unlimited enchantment charges.
descriptionHtml:
The result of a suggestion by GroveJr here on the Nexus forums, this mod does exactly what the name suggests.

The Staff of Magnus and Auriel's Bow no longer have those annoying enchantment charges; You're free to use them as often as you want, without recharging!

The Dawnguard file contains the modification for Auriel's Bow, and, obviously, requires Dawnguard.

The other file requires only vanilla Skyrim, and modifies ONLY the Staff of Magnus.


Compatibility:

-Will be incompatible with any mods which modify the enchantments of the effected artifacts
-All retextures/remeshes should be compatible


Intended to complement my Unlimted Use of Daedric Artifacts mod, found here:Â http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56633/?


Permissions:

-See permissions tab
author: GreatSilentOne
